days.text: 雨 夜遅く くもり | Cloudy

Mainly cloudy. A few rain patches at first. Slightly cooler in the morning. | くもり 昼前 から 夕方 晴れ | Slight flooding may occur in Inner Harbour area from 9 pm ~ 0 am due to astronomical tide. Mainly cloudy. A few rain patches at first. Force 4 to 5 north to northeasterly winds, occasionally force 6 with gusts.
Sunny intervals. Dry during the day. | 晴れ 時々 くもり | Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 4 to 5 north to northeasterly winds with gusts.
Sunny periods. Dry during the day. | Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Sunny periods. Dry during the day. | Dry. Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
